short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ThatNeedle Gist provides instant AI-generated summaries of YouTube Videos in  a collapsible sidebar to the right.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ThatNeedle Gist is a browser extension designed to enhance YouTube browsing by providing instant, AI-generated summaries of YouTube Videos. Its single purpose is to offer users quick insights into video content without leaving their current page. The extension adds a collapsible sidebar to every YouTube webpage, which, when activated, displays a concise summary of the video's main points in multiple languages. This feature allows users to rapidly grasp the essence of the video saving time and improving information retention. By focusing solely on this summarization functionality, ThatNeedle Gist aims to streamline the web browsing experience, making it more efficient and informative for users. It also allows the user to get the transcript of the video translated in a language of their choice.
